SEARCH
Module org.example.scdpro2
Package org.example.scdpro2.ui.views.ClassDiagram

Class ClassDiagramPane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
org.example.scdpro2.ui.views.ClassDiagram.ClassDiagramPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class ClassDiagramPane extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane
ClassDiagramPane is a UI component that represents a class diagram in the application. It allows for the manipulation of class boxes, zooming, dragging, and managing relationships between them.

  • Property Summary

  • Field Details

    • zoomFactor

      public double zoomFactor

  • Constructor Details

    • ClassDiagramPane

      public ClassDiagramPane(MainView mainView, MainController controller, DiagramService diagramService)
      Constructs a ClassDiagramPane object with the specified parameters. Initializes zoom and drag functionality for the pane.
      Parameters:
      mainView - The main view of the application.
      controller - The main controller managing the application's logic.
      diagramService - The service handling diagram-related logic.

  • Method Details

    • highlightClassBox

      public void highlightClassBox(String className)
      Highlights the class box with the given name by applying a specific style.
      Parameters:
      className - The name of the class box to highlight.

    • unhighlightAllClassBoxes

      public void unhighlightAllClassBoxes()
      Removes the highlighting from all class boxes.

    • handleClassBoxClick

      public void handleClassBoxClick(ClassBox clickedClassBox, javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Handles the click event on a class box. If in relationship mode, it triggers the appropriate logic to create relationships between class boxes.
      Parameters:
      clickedClassBox - The class box that was clicked.
      event - The mouse event triggering the action.

    • setRelationshipModeEnabled

      public void setRelationshipModeEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Enables or disables the relationship mode. In this mode, users can select class boxes to create relationships between them.
      Parameters:
      enabled - Indicates whether relationship mode is enabled.

    • clearSelectedClass

      public void clearSelectedClass()
      Clears the currently selected class box, if any, by removing the highlight.

    • addClassBox

      public void addClassBox(ClassBox classBox)
      Adds a class box to the diagram if it does not already exist in the UI. Registers the class box and updates the UI map.
      Parameters:
      classBox - The class box to add.

    • getClassBoxByTitle

      public ClassBox getClassBoxByTitle(String className)
      Retrieves the class box in the diagram with the specified title.
      Parameters:
      className - The name of the class box to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The class box with the specified name, or null if not found.

    • setCurrentRelationshipType

      public void setCurrentRelationshipType(RelationshipLine.RelationshipType type)
      Sets the type of relationship for connecting class boxes (e.g., inheritance, association).
      Parameters:
      type - The relationship type.

    • registerClassBox

      public void registerClassBox(ClassBox classBox)
      Registers a class box for handling click events. If in relationship mode, it enables the selection of class boxes to create relationships.
      Parameters:
      classBox - The class box to register.

    • getRelationshipLinesConnectedTo

      public List<RelationshipLine> getRelationshipLinesConnectedTo(Object box)
      Retrieves all relationship lines connected to a given class box.
      Parameters:
      box - The class box to check for connected relationship lines.
      Returns:
      A list of relationship lines connected to the specified class box.

    • removeRelationshipLine

      public void removeRelationshipLine(RelationshipLine line)
      Removes a specific relationship line from the UI and the relationships list.
      Parameters:
      line - The relationship line to remove.

    • clearDiagrams

      public void clearDiagrams()
      Clears all diagrams and removes all UI elements from the pane.

    • getRelationships

      public List<RelationshipLine> getRelationships()
      Retrieves the list of relationships currently present in the class diagram pane.
      Returns:
      A list of relationship lines.

    • getClassBoxForDiagram

      public ClassBox getClassBoxForDiagram(BClassBox diagram)
      Retrieves the class box for a specific diagram model.
      Parameters:
      diagram - The class diagram to search for.
      Returns:
      The class box corresponding to the specified diagram, or null if not found.

    • getMainView

      public MainView getMainView()
      Retrieves the main view associated with the diagram pane.
      Returns:
      The main view of the application.
